actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives respecting travel by members and employees of committees of the House.

summary.text: Amends rule XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit a committee from paying a Member or employee of the committee for travel expenses incurred in the performance of official duties unless a statement is filed before and after the travel setting forth legislative objectives and proposed travel costs (first statement) and legislative objectives realization (second statement).

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives respecting travel by members and employees of committees of the House.
